response.original_title: Gaither Gospel Series: We Will Stand
response.overview: When Bill and Gloria Gaither and their Homecoming Friends joined voices with Bishop T.D. Jakes and some of the finest talents in traditional black and Hispanic gospel on the stage of Bishop Jakes famed Potter's House in Dallas, it was an evening of breaking down all barriers, musical, cultural, denominational, and racial.  Songs include: I'm so Glad, Bless His Holy Name, Let's Just Praise the Lord, We Will Stand, I've Got a Feeling, All People That On Earth Do Dwell, Until I Found the Lord, His Eye Is on the Sparrow, In the Morning, I Must Tell Jesus, When I survey the Wondrous Cross, Dream On, Sweeter As the Days Go By, I Came to Jesus, Hebrew Lullaby, If That Don't Make You Wanna Go, He's That Kind of Friend, Center of My Joy.
response.title: Gaither Gospel Series: We Will Stand
